nodes.text:
I don't care Darius, you can't just swap the holovid order as you did without consulting with the rest of us! 

Replacing [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidClansOfNewSamarkand],Clans of New Samarkand]] halfway in the season with [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidFemaleSlaversOfDariah],Female Slavers Of Dariah]], what are you thinking?

The XO might be expecting a visit later, Yang?

Of a certain redhead, perhaps?
Everyone stop, it was an honest mistake, I was just checking the new holovid and forgot to put the old one back into the player.

I see that the crew meetings haven't changed much while I was gone, Commander.

They are still lively as before.
Yes Ilkhan... I mean, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Connecting to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBadKitty],Bad Kitty]] now.
[Holovid transmission initializing.]
Tequila! It makes you happy! Argo, you finally arrived!

branches.responseText: Hello Captain Murray, are you having a party?

nodes.text: And not too unfashionably late to join our little party at [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFairuza],Fairuza]] against the [[DM.Factions[faction_HarbingersOfDoom],Harbingers]]. You haven't remembered to bring more [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMaglissTequila],Canopian tequila]], da?

Wait.... no... Captain Memphis has already retired to his DropShip and took all the remaining tequila with him.

Before he left, we were thinking of renaming ourselves the 'Princess' Misfits' until Captain Johnson vetoed it... oh, he retired too.

branches.responseText: Why have they left? Wasn't this a briefing?

nodes.text:
And they have been briefed since you and your friends took a while to join our little party. 

Too bad your queen didn't send more... I was expecting more. Much more. Just more tequila.

Captain Murray, you've assembled quite a flotilla in orbit, that's the Hostile Intentions of the [[DM.Factions[faction_DevilsDisciples],Devil's Disciples]], and the Pegasus from the [[DM.Factions[faction_GhostRiders],Ghost Riders]], plus your own Satan's Kittens and us. With all those DropShips in orbit, what are you expecting to find down there?

Mister Woodpecker, the equivalent of more than a regiment being assembled and waiting to strike at your [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganReach],Reach]] and your [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKameaArano],best friend]].

However, they weren't expecting us here so we have orbital superiority... had... have it still.

More than a full regiment? 

Even if that is true, between all of the groups present here, there's about two companies of 'Mechs, Captain Murray.

Yeah, damn you nobles for not sending real help other than the Ghost Riders, in addition to having me to deal with your lot. We needed at least twice as many troops from your Princess for my plan A to work, now it's time for plan B.

branches.responseText: I don't like this already... what was plan A?

nodes.text:
A series of hit and run strikes to destroy their supply network and slow the Harbinger offensive. 

They have the numbers over us but we can deploy by air and they can't defend everywhere.

For maximum effect we'll split between several task forces since that will also force them to divide their response.

Less risky, still perfect plan, now that you are all here, you'll love it.

branches.responseText: And how is plan B different from plan A?

nodes.text:
We'd be just hunting them instead of blowing up their ammunition and spares in the process. 

I had hoped we might also be able to raid some of their supplies for our own use but we'll just have to slow them down.

Captain Murray, you seem pretty certain of all this intel, where did you get it?

How do you know they're even gonna strike at the Aurigan worlds?

Four Eyes, considering what I have experienced so far with them, they have the numbers and the motivation to make such an attempt, plus there was an uptick in reports from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCapellanMarches],Capellan Marches]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHyadesRim],Hyades Rim]]. So, before they showed up and start setting up their forward base, I started making plans in case they invaded your realm.

That still doesn't explain how you knew knew that the Harbingers would attack.

And your story about the [[DM.Factions[faction_TortugaDominion],Tortuga Dominion]] and these raiders hasn't been fully confirmed as well.
Yob tvoyu mat. Johnson! Get over here and talk what you know to this idiot, perhaps you'll convince him... oh, I forgot, he left the party too after he lost the bet...

<static> I've already patched in from my DropShip and you still haven't won our bet, Laura.

Lord Madeira, Commander, nice to see you all again since the ambush at [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCygnus],Cygnus]].

The Ghost Riders have already made some preliminary recon before you arrival and I can personally confirm what Captain Murray said, they aren't expecting us and we have orbital superiority, at least for now.

And that is starting to worry me a lot, Captain Johnson.

Where are the defenders' [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJumpShip],JumpShips]] and why did they left most of their ground forces stranded in this world?

They're interdicting all systems in the area to prevent outsiders from even knowing of their presence.

That means capturing or destroying any JumpShips or DropShips present.

Interdicting? 

You mean [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreArtru],Artru]] and the appearance of that [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDarkJumpShip],Dark JumpShip]]...

Yes Mr. Oliveira, there have been other reports of worlds going into blackout and unknown JumpShips capturing or destroying all space traffic in this region of the Periphery.

And considering the remoteness of this region, it will take months or even years until someone notices something went odd with the Reach.

And even [[DM.Factions[faction_ComStar],ComStar]]'s eunuchs and the other [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSpheroid],Spheroids]] won't notice anything odd since they are so busy in their great [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore4thSuccessionWar],inner war]]. It will all burn! Burn!
What both of you are saying has been partially confirmed by Colonel Haust and Aurigan intelligence before I left Tyrlon but it's quite a stretch...

Fuck Aurigan intelligence, because they have no idea of what is coming to hit your princess. 

See for yourself below us, your fucking Grace, and in case you don't believe your sensors, feel free to check them personally on the ground.
I am not questioning that this can only be an invasion force stationed right outside our worlds or that a blockade is in progress, what I am not sure is their identity and objective, Captain Murray.

Murder them all!

And either you idiots have something useful to contribute on that matter, or you can shut up and get the fuck out of my task force!
Laura, we are just trying to figure out exactly...
XO, sometimes you do sound like one of those ComStar eunuchs. Slovach, see you all on the ground. Kitten Actual is out.
[Connection lost.]

That went as expected from that woman.

Almost zero social skills and alcohol can be quite a terrible mix.

Just leave her... she'll be sober enough to lead her lance to her target later after some rest.

She was expecting for the Dark JumpShips to be here, like the one you've encountered over Artru.

Yes, there's quite some bad blood between her and those raiders and that ship got mentioned quite several times by Captain Murray.

So she got quite disappointed when it wasn't here. And also to get drunk until you arrived.

Captain Johnson, any idea on what's the origin of the feud?

She reminds me of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMaximillianLiao],Chancellor Liao]]'s obsession with [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHanseDavion],Hanse Davion]].

That's a puzzle inside an enigma also to me and we have no time to spare.

We've identified convoys all over the planet, the faster we deploy the quicker we can move to the next phase.

branches.responseText: Back to that, what's the next phase?

nodes.text:
After we finish our raids against their convoys they will regroup and fortify their bases but without air superiority they can't react quickly to our losses.

So we'll use the opportunity to hit a couple more high value targets and then we leave.

branches.responseText: Understood, send us the coordinates and available intel.

nodes.text:
Roger that, good hunting Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.

Ghost Actual is out.
